titleStmt.title: A Letter concerning Sir William Whitlock's bill for the trials in cases of treason written Oct. 1693 upon the request of a friend who is an honest member of the House of Commons, and now committed to the press upon the solicitation of several who think it may be of publick use to let it come abroad before the next meeting of the Parliament.
titleStmt.author: H. N.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
